result.arabic_text: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِۚ وَمَن يُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابٗا صَعَدٗا
result.translation: Kugira ngo Tubagerageze ko bashima inema bahawe n’Imana Allah. Uwo wese rero azokwirengagiza kwumviriza no kugendera urwibutso rw’Imana yiwe Rurema Allah rwa Qor’ani, Imana Allah Izomushira mu bihano bikomeye.
